item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.fail_s: Your spirituality is insufficient to guide the pendulum...
item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.found: The pendulum trembles... It points to a treasure!
item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.not_fo: The pendulum remains still. Nothing valuable nearby.
item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.track_: Could not locate %s. They might be too far or offline.
message.foolsjourney.seer_potion_consume: You begin to feel the strings of fate... (Sequence 9: Seer)
message.foolsjourney.already_beyonder: You are already walking a path, consuming more brings madness!
advancement.foolsjourney.root.title: The Fool's Journey
advancement.foolsjourney.root.desc: Consume the Seer Potion and grasp the strings of fate.
advancement.foolsjourney.pendulum.title: Spirit Dowser
advancement.foolsjourney.pendulum.desc: Craft a Spirit Pendulum to locate the unseen.
message.foolsjourney.digestion_complete: Potion fully digested! Fate calls you to the next step.
commands.foolsjourney.reset_success: Reset player %s! They are now mundane.
message.foolsjourney.advance_clown: Your facial muscles twitch... Time to smile at the world! (Sequence 8: Clown)
message.foolsjourney.already_sequence: You are already at this sequence or higher.
message.foolsjourney.potion_failure: Your body rejected the power! You are losing control!
message.foolsjourney.potion_undigested: You haven't fully digested the previous potion! Your spirituality revolts!
message.foolsjourney.loss_of_control_ris: Cracks form in your mind! You are on the verge of madness...
message.foolsjourney.loss_of_control_dea: YOU LOST CONTROL! The whispers turn into a scream and your body mutates...
message.foolsjourney.potion_failure: Your body rejected the power! You are losing control!
message.foolsjourney.loss_of_control_dea: YOU LOST CONTROL! The whispers turn into a scream and your body mutates...
